item.description:
Mandarin Conversation group Meetup.

2nd and 4th Monday meetings to practice Mandarin conversation. Learners of all levels, and native speakers welcome!

This Time we will demo some Chinese Calligraphy (if I can find my stuff) and watch a Chinese movie (with subtitles) thanks to David Liang. Please feel free to bring your favorite movie munchies to share with the group. We will start close to 6:30PM, Cause the places closes around 8:30pm or there after. I might have to skip the Calligraphy till next time.

Adele

Note:
Should be 5th Floor not Board room that location has no edit functions available? (Don't know why)


------------

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Chinese Language (4th Monday) October Meetup
